Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: stream
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This specifies the name of the stream to open in a media player.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: detectioninfo
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This returns information about the playing stream.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: isstreaming
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This specifies if there is a stream open.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: -getDetectionInfo
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This method retrieves the stream information of a URL.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: -startStream
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This method starts streamlink with the specified arguments, stream url and stream name.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.name: -getAvailableStreams
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This method returns a list of available streams.

Classes/streamlinkdetector.html.name: streamlinkdetector
Classes/streamlinkdetector.html.abstract: This class allows you run a stream with streamlink and obtain stream information (title, episode, site)
